definition: continuing or enduring without marked change in status or condition or place, a series of waves in the hair made by applying heat and chemicals
details:
adjective
- continuing or enduring without marked change in status or condition or place
= example: continuing or enduring without marked change in status or condition or place
= synonyms: lasting
- not capable of being reversed or returned to the original condition
= example: not capable of being reversed or returned to the original condition
noun
- a series of waves in the hair made by applying heat and chemicals
= synonyms: permanent wave, perm
